attributes.additional_details:
In a time of heightened terror threats the government and any elected government will make cuts to our security police forces putting us at huge risk of not being able to respond to an act of terror on our streets! This is dangerous and short sighted.
Sign this petition to ensure our security forces have no cuts in future so they can invest in protecting law abiding citizens and our society. Sign now so the government know how the public feels before the elections!
